messages.title: My Priorities for Hull North
messages.content:
Backing Boris to Get Brexit Done
Investing in the NHS
More Local Police

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Backing Boris to Get Brexit Done

issues.brexitEurope: Backing Boris to Get Brexit Done
issues.education: More funding for every pupil in every school.

community.content: More Local Police; More local police to fight crime

leaflet.personalStatement: Like the people of Hull North, I voted to leave. I campaigned passionately for Brexit and I am committed to seeing it delivered. Your local Labour MP has ignored the views of her constituents and has voted in Parliament to frustrate Brexit. I will back Boris to get Brexit done. I am pleased that Boris has pledged more money for the NHS. Good healthcare, free at the point of use, is a principle I will always defend. I appreciate the value of the NHS. My Grandmother moved down south from Yorkshire to become a nurse after the war. We need more police locally to fight crime and keep our streets safe. I welcome Boris’s pledge of 20,000 extra police officers. In my role as a councillor, I have promoted closer working between police and community stakeholders.

contactInformation.address: North East field Hull Conservatives, 29 Newland Park, Hull, HU5 2DR

Backing Boris to Get Brexit Done
